comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Endre Botka sends a superb cross into the box. Myrto Uzuni (Ferencvaros) latches on to it and from near the penalty spot powers a header inside the left post, leaving Andreas Linde beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 0:2.
